sections.title: Overview: Antigravity vs Codeium
paragraphs: Antigravity (developer tools) is Antigravity is a revolutionary multi-agent AI code editor that debuted at #1 in December 2026 developer rankings. Completely free during preview, it features unique multi-agent orchestration where multiple AI agents collaborate on complex coding tasks, integrated Chrome browser automation for testing, and support for the latest models (Gemini 3 Pro, Claude Sonnet 4.5/Opus 4.5). Its key differentiator is multi-agent collaboration—a capability no competitor offers—enabling it to tackle complex projects autonomously.. It's known for code-editor, ai-agents, multi-agent.

Codeium (developer tools) is Codeium is an AI-powered coding assistant that provides intelligent code completion, chat, and search directly within the developer's IDE. Its key capabilities include autocomplete for over 70+ languages, a contextual chat interface for code explanations and generation, and advanced code search. It uniquely positions itself by offering a generous free tier for individual developers with no usage caps, while focusing on security and privacy with on-premise deployment options for enterprises.. Users choose it for ai-code-completion, developer-tools, ide-extension.

sections.title: Key Features
paragraphs: Antigravity: Multi-agent orchestration (unique feature), Integrated Chrome browser automation, Live preview and design-to-code

verdict: Both Antigravity and Codeium are excellent AI tools. For developer tools, your choice depends on specific needs: Antigravity for code-editor, Codeium for ai-code-completion.
